Uses of Package
ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence

  • Packages that use ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence 
    Package Description
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.feature
    Provides for implementations to construct particular "shapes" for a feature.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot
    Provides necessary code to draw out different types of plots on a GView map.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype
    Provides implementations of different "prototype" shapes.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype.segments
    Provides implementations of different segments used to construct a "prototype" shape.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence
    Provides for methods to use to layout and position any items along the sequence, and dividing up the map into different slots.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.circular
    Provides for layout implementations specific to the circular mode.
    ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.linear
    Provides layout implementations specific to the linear mode.
    ca.corefacility.gview.managers
    Provides for dynamic handling of different items on the map.
    ca.corefacility.gview.managers.labels
    Provides for classes to handle management of labels.
    ca.corefacility.gview.managers.ruler
    Provides for classes to handle management of the items for the Ruler on the GView map.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map
    Provides for implementations of the main GView map, as well as some extras (Birds eye view, etc).
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.event
    Provides for implementations of different events in GView.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui
    Provides for implementations of a simple GUI for the GView map.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor
    Provides classes for the Style Editor.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.inputHandler
    Provides for classes to handle different aspects of user input.
    ca.corefacility.gview.map.items
    Provides for implementations of specific items to be displayed on the GView map.
  • Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence used by ca.corefacility.gview.layout.feature 
    Class and Description
    LocationConverter
    Allows conversions from constant locations (such as full) to actual locations.
    SlotPath
    Builds a general path by transforming the sequence-specific coords, to coords on the screen in an appropriate slot.
  • Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence used by ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot 
    Class and Description
    SlotPath
    Builds a general path by transforming the sequence-specific coords, to coords on the screen in an appropriate slot.
  • Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence used by ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype 
    Class and Description
    Backbone
    Backbone stores the actual shape of the backbone, and how items should "wrap" themselves around backbone.
    SequencePath.Orientation
    Defines the orientation of particular lines along the path, used for some effects.
  • Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence used by ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype.segments 
    Class and Description
    Backbone
    Backbone stores the actual shape of the backbone, and how items should "wrap" themselves around backbone.
    SequencePath.Orientation
    Defines the orientation of particular lines along the path, used for some effects.
  • Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence used by ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence 
    Class and Description
    Backbone
    Backbone stores the actual shape of the backbone, and how items should "wrap" themselves around backbone.
    Backbone.ShiftDirection 
    BaseRange 
    HeightRange
    Defines a range in terms of height coordinates on the sequence.
    LocationConverter
    Allows conversions from constant locations (such as full) to actual locations.
    RulerLabelThicknessCalculator
    Determines the maximum thickness of any given ruler label.
    SequencePath
    Allows drawing of arbitrary shapes along the Sequence.
    SequencePath.Orientation
    Defines the orientation of particular lines along the path, used for some effects.
    SequenceRectangle
    Defines a rectangle in terms of sequence coordinates (BaseRange, HeightRange)
    SlotPath
    Builds a general path by transforming the sequence-specific coords, to coords on the screen in an appropriate slot.
    SlotRegion
    Provides access to objects that can layout shapes on certain regions.
    SlotTranslator
    Used to access the thicknesses/heights of slots from the backbone.
  • Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence used by ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.circular

    AbstractSequencePath

    Backbone.ShiftDirection 
    LayoutFactory
    Provides for a way to construct a particular Layout.
    LocationConverter
    Allows conversions from constant locations (such as full) to actual locations.
    RulerLabelThicknessCalculator
    Determines the maximum thickness of any given ruler label.
    ScaleCalculator
    Used to determine scale transisions for labels (dependent on the layout).
    SequencePath
    Allows drawing of arbitrary shapes along the Sequence.
    SequencePath.Orientation
    Defines the orientation of particular lines along the path, used for some effects.
    SequenceRectangle
    Defines a rectangle in terms of sequence coordinates (BaseRange, HeightRange)
    SlotRegion
    Provides access to objects that can layout shapes on certain regions.
    SlotTranslator
    Used to access the thicknesses/heights of slots from the backbone.
